lead_paragraph: GOLDMAN--Bertha Deck, 95, of Glen Rock, NJ passed away Friday. Bertha was married to Jacob Goldman, owner of Farmland Dairies, for 60 years. Bertha is survived by two sons, Marc and Steven, three daughters, Diane, Karen, and Arlene, eight grandchildren and three great grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLDMAN, BERTHA DECK
